Yeah but this outfit seems too far off the school outfit that magical girls use. There isn't much school clothing that has that much detail from the sailor outfit. I get that's what the school clothing is based on but they don't really put so much of it at least as far as I can tell. I don't see those sailor's shoulder pads in school outfits (No, not the golden shoulder pad on Riven's left shoulder. I mean the shoulder pad on her right shoulder). And I don't think the average school girl would where those types of heels and have a sailor hat with an anchor design on it. Riven looks more like a young adult, and magical girls are typically teenage looking (Not to mention 14 years old according to Doug Walker's research on Sailor Moon).

Plus the background makes her look like a Naval Commander. Unless you could add some school elements into the background. The naval ship alone just brings the whole idea out of place. Maybe lean the background design towards the magical girl theme and maybe it will look more like a magical girl. Japanese School Background? Sparkling dust patterns? Femalish coloring? Maybe one of those.
